name: Jewels Dragon Quest
description:
Move the block to match the same 3 pieces
and clear various missions
experience 500 stages and special jewels!

[Features]
- brain puzzle game with simple rule
- no play limit such as heart, play as much as you can!
- can play even without network!
- game file is as low as 25M, light-weight download!
- supports tablet screen
- supports 14 languages


Homepage:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=4931745640662708567
